evidence.text: The Court issued its Findings of Fact and Conclusions of Law on January 6, 2023, which concluded that Congressional District No. 1 constituted an unconstitutional racial gerrymander in violation of the Equal Protection Clause of the Fourteenth Amendment. The Court enjoined the conducting of elections in Congressional District No. 1 until a constitutionally valid apportionment plan was approved by the Court. (Dkt. No. 493 at 30-31).

extracted.value: January 6, 2023: Entry of the injunction order (Dkt. No. 493)

evidence.text: The Court hereby exercises its authority under Rule 62(d) to modify its injunction to preserve the status quo on appeal. ... AND IT IS SO ORDERED. March 28, 2024

extracted.value: March 28, 2024: Modification of the injunction order to preserve status quo pending appeal (Dkt. No. 523)
